title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The exact answer is x ″ 1 , y ″   1 = −  e cos1 sin1,−2sin1 . A response of −  e cost sint,−2sint = −  e cos1 sin1,−2sin1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGajpC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaaadaqaaiabgk HiTiaayIW7caWGLbWaaWbaaSqabeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiGacogacaGG VbGaai4CaiaadshaaaGcciGGZbGaaiyAaiaac6gacaWG0bGaaiilai abgkHiTiaaikdaciGGZbGaaiyAaiaac6gacaWG0baapaGaayzkJiaa wQYiaiabg2da9maaamaabaGaeyOeI0IaaGjcVlaadwgadaahaaWcbe qaa8qaciGGJbGaai4BaiaacohacaaIXaaaaOGaci4CaiaacMgacaGG UbGaaGymaiaacYcacqGHsislcaaIYaGaci4CaiaacMgacaGGUbGaaG ymaaWdaiaawMYicaGLQmcaaaa@5FF3@ or equivalent earns only 1 of the 2 points because it equates an expression to a numerical value.

An unsupported correct acceleration vector earns 1 of the 2 points.

The acceleration vector may be presented with other symbols, for example , MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaqadaqaaiaacY caaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaaa@3B34@ or , . The components may be listed separately, as long as they are labeled.

Degree mode: A response that presents answers obtained by using a calculator in degree mode does not earn the first point it would have otherwise earned. The response is generally eligible for all subsequent points (unless no answer is possible in degree mode or the question is made simpler by using degree mode). title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

A response with an implied equation is eligible for both points. For example, a response of " Speed= e cost 2 + 2cost 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGtbGaaeiCai aabwgacaqGLbGaaeizaiabg2da9maakaaabaWaaeWaaeaacaWGLbWa aWbaaSqabeaaciGGJbGaai4BaiaacohacaWG0baaaaGccaGLOaGaay zkaaWaaWbaaSqabeaacaaIYaaaaOGaey4kaSYaaeWaaeaacaaIYaGa ci4yaiaac+gacaGGZbGaamiDaaGaayjkaiaawMcaamaaCaaaleqaba GaaGOmaaaaaeqaaaaa@4DD6@ and is first equal to 1.5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIXaGaaiOlai aaiwdaaaa@3B27@ at t=1.254 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG0bGaeyypa0 JaaGymaiaac6cacaaIYaGaaGynaiaaisdaaaa@3EA0@ " earns both points.

Both of these responses are eligible to earn the second point.

A response need not consider the value t=2.358077. A response with a parenthesis error(s) in either e cost 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbm aabmaapaqaa8qacaWGLbWdamaaCaaaleqabaWdbiGacogacaGGVbGa ai4CaiaadshaaaaakiaawIcacaGLPaaapaWaaWbaaSqabeaapeGaaG Omaaaaaaa@40D7@ or 2cost 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaqadaqaaiaaik daciGGJbGaai4BaiaacohacaWG0baacaGLOaGaayzkaaWaaWbaaSqa beaacaaIYaaaaaaa@3FF5@ does not earn the first point but does earn the second point for the correct answer. Note: dx dt 2 + dy dt 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaGcaaqaaabaaa aaaaaapeWaaSaaa8aabaWdbiaadsgacaWG4baapaqaa8qacaWGKbGa amiDaaaapaWaaWbaaSqabeaapeGaaGOmaaaakiabgUcaRmaalaaapa qaa8qacaWGKbGaamyEaaWdaeaapeGaamizaiaadshaaaWdamaaCaaa leqabaWdbiaaikdaaaaapaqabaaaaa@4463@ is not considered a parenthesis error.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

To earn the first point, the response must communicate dy dx =   dy dt   dx dt ; MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbm aalaaapaqaa8qacaWGKbGaamyEaaWdaeaapeGaamizaiaadIhaaaGa eyypa0ZaaSaaaeaacaaMe8+aaSaaaeaacaWGKbGaamyEaaqaaiaads gacaWG0baaaiaaysW7aeaadaWcaaqaaiaadsgacaWG4baabaGaamiz aiaadshaaaaaaiaacUdaaaa@49D6@ for example:

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first point is earned for presenting the correct integrand in a definite integral.

Parentheses errors were assessed in part (b) and, therefore, will not affect the scoring in part (d).

If the integrand is an incorrect speed function imported from part (b), the response earns the first point and does not earn the second point.
